question: What is the name of the third Scorpene-class submarine that has been inducted into the Indian Navy recently?
explanation:
The Indian Navy has inducted into its fleet INS Karanj â€“ the third Scorpene-class conventional diesel-electric submarine.
This has been built by the Mazagon Dock Limited (MDL) under its project 75. Under this project, six Scorpene-class submarines are built under technology transfer from France.
